channel.title: Glasgow on Broomhill Community Council
channel.description: Recent content in Glasgow on Broomhill Community Council

item.title: Street Play Announcement
item.description: Glasgow City Council are excited to share an incredible initiative that brings local communities together, Street Play!

item.title: Information on Pavement Parking Ban in Glasgow
item.description: Glasgow City Council will soon implement new enforcement measures to address pavement parking. This initiative aims to enhance road safety and pedestrian accessibility across the city.

item.title: Have your say about Air Quality in Glasgow
item.description: This plan aims to engage us - stakeholders and the general public - in meaningful dialogue. It's about understanding the actions proposed by Glasgow City Council to combat air pollution and achieve better air quality across Glasgow. Your opinions are invaluable in this!
